dishes.name: Tom Yum Goong
dishes.ingredients: lemongrass, chilli, galangal, kaffier lime leaves, shallots, fresh lime juice and plenty of fish sauce

dishes.name: Pad Thai Spicy
dishes.ingredients: stir-fry dish made with rice noodles, shrimp, chicken, or tofu, peanuts,a scrambled egg and bean sprouts

dishes.name: Thai Chicken Satay
dishes.ingredients: Satay is popular throughout Southeast Asia, and this Thai satay recipe offers a traditional taste

dishes.name: Noodle Soup
dishes.ingredients: It can be made with chicken, pork, or beef (rarely vegetarian-friendly)

dishes.name: Spicy Shrimp Soup
dishes.ingredients: lemongrass, chilli, galangal, kaffier lime leaves, shallots, fresh lime juice and plenty of fish sauce

dishes.name: Chicken in Coconut Soup
dishes.ingredients: Tom kha gai is related to tom yum and offers people with a lower tolerance to spice

dishes.name: Green Papaya Salad
dishes.ingredients: Som tam hails from Isaan in Northeastern Thailand and is one of the most popular dishes in Thailand

dishes.name: Yam Pla Dook Foo
dishes.ingredients: The secret to this dish is the pairing of the crispy fish with sweet, sour and spicy green mango salad

dishes.name: Laab (Spicy Salad)
dishes.ingredients: Laab is a northeastern-style salad with meat or mushroom and mint

dishes.name: Khao Pad
dishes.ingredients: Khao pad simply translates to “fried rice” and is just that with some egg
